document.full_text: russia and china joined western powers on thursday in piling pressure on iran to address fears about possible military aspects of its nuclear program a day after tehran said its would ramp up its uranium enrichment.
document.title: six powers push defiant iran to address nuclear fears
lines_and_colors: russia and china joined western powers on thursday in piling pressure on iran to address fears about possible military aspects of its nuclear program a day after tehran said its would ramp up its uranium enrichment.
